episodes.title: The Profit (2001) | Full Movie [HD Remaster]
episodes.description:
🔄 Remastered & Re-uploaded for Better Viewing.

The Profit (2001) is a dramatic, fictionalized film often interpreted as a critique of cults and in particular Scientology, as the plot seems to loosely parody the story of Scientology's founder L. Ron Hubbard. Originally uploaded to this channel in 2020, the version you’re watching now has been remastered in 1080p HD with improved audio and video clarity.

📌 Note: This film has been of interest to those studying cult dynamics, psychological control, and group manipulation. It remains one of the most requested uploads on Decultified.

🧠 For deeper dives into cult tactics and deprogramming, check out our other content:
▶️ Cults in Under 60 Seconds – Quick breakdowns of common manipulation strategies

🔔 Subscribe for more videos exploring cult psychology, real-world examples, and strategies for awareness and recovery.

—

⚠️ Fair Use Disclaimer: This video is shared for educational and commentary purposes under Section 107 of the Copyright Act 1976.

#TheProfit #CultFilms #Decultified #Deprogramming
